item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Musk 'in the process' of 'shutting down' USAID, he says
item.description: President Donald Trump has begun his second administration with a series of controversial moves and decisions.

item.title: Treasury Dept. gives Elon Musk's team access to federal payment system: Sources

item.title: Trump to discuss tariffs with Canadian, Mexican leaders, as Mexico readies response
item.description: Trump told reporters on Sunday he planned to speak with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum on Monday.

item.title: China renews threat to retaliate against US tariffs

item.title: WATCH: Grammys 2025: Couples stun on the red carpet
item.description: From Kelsea Ballerini and Chase Stokes to Chrissy Teigen and John Legend, these celebrity couples turned music’s biggest night into date night.
